title: Google\Cloud\ServiceBuilder
name: ServiceBuilder
description:
Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.

This API aims to expose access to these services in a way that is intuitive and easy to use for PHP enthusiasts. The ServiceBuilder instance exposes factory methods which grant access to the various services contained within the API.

Configuration is simple. Pass in an array of configuration options to the constructor up front which can be shared between clients or specify the options for the specific services you wish to access, e.g. Datastore, or Storage.

Please note that all examples below take advantage of Application Default Credentials.

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Pass in an array of configuration options which will be shared between clients.

params.name: config.projectId
params.description: The project ID from the Google Developer's Console.

params.name: config.authHttpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver Psr7 requests specifically for authentication.

params.name: config.httpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver Psr7 requests.

params.name: config.keyFile
params.description: The contents of the service account credentials .json file retrieved from the Google Developer's Console.

params.name: config.keyFilePath
params.description: The full path to your service account credentials .json file retrieved from the Google Developers Console.

params.name: config.retries
params.description: Number of retries for a failed request. Defaults to 3.

params.name: config.scopes
params.description: Scopes to be used for the request.

methods.name: storage
methods.description: Google Cloud Storage client. Allows you to store and retrieve data on Google's infrastructure. Find more information at Google Cloud Storage API docs.

params.name: config
params.description: Configuration options. See Google\Cloud\ServiceBuilder::__construct() for the available options.

methods.name: bigQuery
methods.description: Google Cloud BigQuery client. Allows you to create, manage, share and query data. Find more information at Google Cloud BigQuery Docs.

params.name: config
params.description: Configuration options. See Google\Cloud\ServiceBuilder::__construct() for the available options.

methods.name: pubsub
methods.description: Google Cloud Pub/Sub client. Allows you to send and receive messages between independent applications. Find more information at Google Cloud Pub/Sub docs.

params.name: config
params.description: Configuration options. See Google\Cloud\ServiceBuilder::__construct() for the available options.

methods.name: vision
methods.description: Google Cloud Vision client. Allows you to understand the content of an image, classify images into categories, detect text, objects, faces and more. Find more information at Google Cloud Vision docs.

params.name: config
params.description: Configuration options. See Google\Cloud\ServiceBuilder::__construct() for the available options.

methods.name: logging
methods.description: Google Stackdriver Logging client. Allows you to store, search, analyze, monitor, and alert on log data and events from Google Cloud Platform and Amazon Web Services. Find more information at Google Stackdriver Logging docs.

params.name: config
params.description: Configuration options. See Google\Cloud\ServiceBuilder::__construct() for the available options.
